channel.title: Need a small bit of help :|
channel.description: How would I like.. move the applet (java, rs) up? Because I have the right HTML to block rs free world ads and the brown bar, but its really still there with a mask over it, which pushes the applet down and making it smaller. If anyone is wondering what I mean, here are pics. Running on a members world - [img]http://xs208.xs.to/xs208/06442/clientinmemb.jpg[/img] Running on a non-members world - [img]http://xs208.xs.to/xs208/06442/clientinnonmem.JPG[/img]
